overview: A Portuguese documentary about Isaac dos Santos, a 20-year-old  going through the process of gender transition. From a very young age, Isaac realized that he did not identify with the female sex, having decided to change his life and his body when he was only 18 years old. The documentary lets you see the whole process of Isaac's transformation, a hard but rewarding journey marked by his strong charisma and determination.
title: RIP 2 My Youth
